title: To your health
brief_description: Referring to the many varied opinions about alcohol, the film sets out to deal only with facts. The distribution and fate of the drug in the body is shown, and its anaesthetic properties affecting reasoning, inhibitions, memory, the special senses and muscular co-ordination described.
